name: CatholicPrayers(Latin)
0:
caret
”Alexa, open catholic prayers Latin”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers Latin to do hail mary”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers Latin to pick a prayer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic prayers latin
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Disclaimer: The prayers are presented in Latin visually and audibly.

Have your Alexa say a prayer for you anytime you like. Just ask it to say a prayer from the list below or you can ask it to pick one for you by saying "pick a prayer."

You can also listen to all the prayers with two other voices: Father David and Sister Angie.

List of Prayers:

Signum Crucis (The Sign of the Cross in Latin)
Oratio Dominica (Our Father in Latin)
Ave Maria (Hail Mary in Latin)
Doxologia Minor (Glory Be in Latin)
Symboloum Apostolorum (The Apostle's Creed in Latin)
Salve Santa Reina (Hail Holy Queen in Latin)
Anima Christi (in Latin)
Memorare (in Latin)
The Angelus (in Latin)
Miraculum Numisma Power (Miraculous Medal Power in Latin)
Oblatio matutina (Morning Offering in Latin)
Sancte Michael Archangele (Saint Michael Prayer in Latin)
Actus Contritionis (Act of Contrition in Latin)
Gratia Ante Cibum (Grace Before Meals in Latin)
Gratia Post Cibum (Grace After Meals in Latin)
Oratio Fatimae (The Fatima Prayer in Latin)
Symbolum Nicaenum (The Nicene Creed in Latin)
Confiteor (I Confess in Latin)
Agnus Dei (Lamb of God in Latin)
Laudes Divinae (The Divine Praises in Latin)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
